attributes.action: Raise the minimum age for Alcohol Off-sales to 21.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition asks you to support the raising of the minimun age for the sale of Alcoholic drink from Off licences, Supermarkets and convenience stores to 21 years of age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
